donationBanner.Text: OnionMedia is a voluntary project by an individual developer, open and ad-free. If you appreciate my work and can afford it, feel free to support me with a small donation.
noInternetConnectionDescription.Text: Please make sure you are connected to the internet so that files can be downloaded.
